short_summary: Supercritical Fluid Extraction of rare earth elements
description: By means of the RFP, NRCan is seeking proposals from bidders for the design and execution of a test program that utilize the Supercritical Fluid Extraction (SCFE) technology to extract and recover rare earth elements from mineral samples.",
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Laboratory Services
## Request ID
* Request for Proposal (RFP) ID: SRV-NRCAN-001
* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Reference Number: PW-22-01004964
## Project Overview
The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) solicits proposals from qualified bidders for the design and execution of a test program that utilizes Supercritical Fluid Extraction (SCFE) technology to extract and recover rare earth elements from mineral samples.  
## Tender Details
* Tender Number: 5000068385
* Tender Closing Date: 20 September 2022 at 14:00 ET
* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Laboratory, Testing, and Inspection Services 
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
## Important Details
* The RFP is available at [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Interested bidders can download the RFP documents from the website.
* Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically to PWGSC in compliance with the instructions outlined in the RFP.
## Contact Information
Please do not hesitate to contact [Raymond Thai, NRCan](mailto:raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca) for any information inquiries related to this RFP.  
## Downloadable Attachments
The following attachments are available for download from the Canada Buys Website:
* [OD ERON Accelerate participant poster](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/22/49ce15d56ce4f62950e883d442c029d1/rfp_nrcan_5000068385.pdf)
* [ERON Accelerate FS final report 2007 v10](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/142f181b34df360b3a1e09d0c3d5ac97/ddp_rncan_5000068385-001.pdf)
